Axiom\_λ1\_CurvatureSignInvariant.statement: λ(B) may not change sign unless B is in sign-flip class λ±.

Axiom\_λ2\_TorsionRankInvariant.statement: Weitzenböck torsion rank must remain constant under λ-operations.

Axiom\_λ4\_δCompatibility.statement: λ must be compatible with δ such that λ∘δ \= δ∘λ in curvature-deviation domain.

Axiom\_λ5\_ProjectionConsistency.statement: Φ-projection applied to λ cannot create undefined curvature classes.

Axiom\_λ6\_TriUnityBridge.statement: λ commutes with Π truth-evaluation in final NF.
